name: Sidestep
Step
ステップ
desc: Swiftly move a short distance by moving in deftly.

Active
Move forward a short distance.
軽快な動作で踏み込み短距離を素早く移動する

name: Sidestep Plus
Step Advance
ステップアドバンス
desc: Extends the duration of invulnerability during a Sidestep.

Passive
Extends the invulnerability during Step.
ステップ中の無敵時間を延長する

name: Sidestep Strike
Step Attack
ステップアタック
desc: Allows you to attack while performing a Sidestep.

Passive
Allows you to perform an attack during a Step.
ステップ中の攻撃アクションが可能となる

name: Perfect Recovery
Just Reversal
ジャストリバーサル
desc: Allows you to quickly jump up after being knocked back onto the ground.

Passive
Press the jump button to quickly recover when knocked down.
吹き飛ばされてダウンしたときにジャンプ操作で素早く起き上がる

name: Guard
Guard
ガード
desc: Allows you to protect against enemy attacks by raising your weapon in front of you.

Active
Hold up your weapon to block enemy attacks.
武器を正面に構えて、エネミーの攻撃を防ぐ

name: Perfect Guard
Just Guard
ジャストガード
desc: Negates damage when you Guard just before getting hit by an enemy attack.

Passive
Use Guard right before an attack to reduce the damage taken significantly.
攻撃を受ける直前にガードをすることで、ダメージを無効にする

name: Perfect Counter
Just Counter
ジャストカウンター
desc: Attacks performed immediately after a successful Perfect Guard become Perfect Attacks.

Passive
Turns attacks right after Just Guards into Just Attacks.
ジャストガード成功直後の攻撃がジャストアタックになる

name: Healing Guard
Healing Guard
ヒーリングガード
desc: Recovers your HP and the HP of others in the vicinity when you perform a successful Perfect Guard.

Passive
When performing a Just Guard, recover HP to yourself and players around you.
ジャストガード発動時、自分と周囲にいるキャラクターのHPを回復する

name: Arms Enthusiast: Hunter
Rare Mastery Hunter
レアマスタリーハンター
desc: Boosts the damage you deal when a weapon of Rarity 10★ or greater is equipped.
This skill can only be used with a Main Class.

Passive
When equipped with a ★10 or higher weapon or crafted weapon, gain a damage bonus.
Main class only.
レアリティ★10以上の武器を装備していると、打撃力が上昇する。このスキルはメインクラスのみ適用される

name: Hunter Focus Boost
Hunter Gear Boost
ハンターギアブースト
desc: Grants a bonus to the rate of increase of the Focus Gauge of Hunter weapons during Fury Stance or Guard Stance.
This skill can only be used with a Main Class.

Passive
During Fury Stance and Guard Stance, gain a bonus to the gear gauge increase rate for Hunter weapons.
Main class only.
フューリースタンス時、ハンター武器のギアゲージの上昇率にボーナスを得る。このスキルはメインクラスのみ適用される

name: Melee Power Up 1
Striking Up 1
打撃アップ1
desc: Boosts your Melee Power.

Passive
Increase your S-ATK.
打撃力が上昇する

name: Melee Power Up 2
Striking Up 2
打撃アップ2
desc: Boosts your Melee Power. Produces a stronger effect than Melee Power Up 1.

Passive
Increase your S-ATK.
打撃力が上昇する

name: Melee Power Up 3
Striking Up 3
打撃アップ3
desc: Boosts your Melee Power. Produces a stronger effect than Melee Power Up 2.

Passive
Increase your S-ATK.
打撃力が上昇する

name: Dexterity Up
Dexterity Up 1
技量アップ1
desc: Boosts your Dexterity.

Passive
Increase your DEX.
技量が上昇する

name: Melee Defense Up
Striking Defense Up 1
打撃防御アップ1
desc: Boosts your Melee Defense.

Passive
Increase your S-DEF.
打撃防御力が上昇する

name: HP Up 1
HP Up 1
HPアップ1
desc: Boosts your max HP.

Passive
Increase your maximum HP.
HP最大値が上昇する

name: HP Up 2
HP Up 2
HPアップ2
desc: Boosts your max HP. Produces a stronger effect than HP Up 1.

Passive
Increase your maximum HP.
HP最大値が上昇する

name: HP Up 3
HP Up 3
HPアップ3
desc: Boosts your max HP. Produces a stronger effect than HP Up 2.

Passive
Increase your maximum HP.
HP最大値が上昇する

name: Partisan Focus
Partisan Gear
パルチザンギア
desc: Consumes one segment of your Focus Gauge to expand you attack range and increase your Potency when using Photon Arts.

Passive
PAs consume one Gear Gauge stock to increase their attack area and power.
PA使用時にギアゲージを1つ消費して攻撃範囲を広げ威力が上昇する

name: Wired Lance Focus
Wired Lance Gear
ワイヤードランスギア
desc: Consumes one segment of your Focus Gauge to increase your potency when using hold Photon Arts.

Passive
Hold PAs consume one Gear Gauge stock to increase their power
ホールドPA使用時にギアゲージを1つ消費して威力が上昇する

name: Sword Focus
Sword Gear
ソードギア
desc: Alters your attack range, hit count, and charge speed by Photon-Art type when you charge up your Focus Gauge.

Passive
By filling the Gear Gauge the attack area, number of hits and charge tempo change depending on the PA.
ギアゲージを溜めることで、PAの種類に応じて攻撃範囲、ヒット数、チャージ速度が変化する

name: Iron Will
Iron Will
アイアンウィル
desc: Adds a chance of retaining 1 HP whgen you suffer damage that would have otherwise incapacitated you. Renders you invincible for a short period of time when activated.

Passive
May survive with 1 HP left when receiving damage that would kill you.
戦闘不能となるダメージを受けたとき、HPが1残ることがある

name: Stalwart Spirit
Never Give Up
ネバーギブアップ
desc: Ups Melee Power for 60 seconds after using Iron Will, and extends invulnerability. Raising the skill level boosts Melee Power and extends invulnerability even more.

Passive
Increases your S-ATK for 60 seconds after Iron Will activates. Become invulnerable for a short time. Higher levels increase S-ATK and invulnerability duration.
アイアンウィル発動後、60秒間打撃力が増加し、短時間無敵状態になる。レベルが上がると打撃力と無敵時間が増加する。

name: War Cry
War Cry
ウォークライ
desc: Draws the enemy's attention to you.

Active
Attract the attention of enemies.
エネミーの注意を引き付ける

name: War Brave
War Brave
ウォーブレイブ
desc: Recovers PP according to the number of enemies targeted and grants a 60-second damage bonus while War Cry is active.
This skill can only be used with a Main Class.

Passive
When using War Cry, recover PP according to the number of enemies affected and gain a damage bonus for 60 seconds.
Main class only.
ウォークライ発動時、対象エネミー数に応じてPPが回復し、30秒ダメージボーナスを得る。このスキルはメインクラスのみ適用される

name: Guard Stance
Guard Stance
ガードスタンス
desc: Active Stance skill that reduces the melee and ranged damage you deal while also reducing the level of melee damage you take. Renders Fury Stance ineffective.

Active
Stance which reduces striking and ranged damage dealt and striking damage received.
エネミーへの打撃・射撃ダメージを低下させ、自分への打撃ダメージを軽減するスタンススキル。リキャスト60秒

name: Guard Stance Poison
Guard Stance Poison
ガードスタンスポイズン
desc: Heals status ailment Poison when Guard Stance is in use.

Passive
Recover from poison status when activating Guard Stance.
ガードスタンス発動時に状態異常ポイズンを回復する

name: Guard Stance Burn
Guard Stance Burn
ガードスタンスバーン
desc: Heals status ailment Burn when Guard Stance is in use.

Passive
Recover from burn status when activating Guard Stance.
ガードスタンス発動時に状態異常バーンを回復する

name: Not Bad
Pretty Good
プリティグッド
desc: Reduces the duration of status ailments affecting you.

Passive
Shortens the duration of status abnormalities inflicted on you.
自分が受けた状態異常の時間を短縮する

name: Auto-Mate Half
Automate Halfline
オートメイトハーフライン
desc: Automatically uses a "-mate" item when your HP falls below 50%.

Passive
When your HP fall below 50%, automatically use a Mate item on yourself.
HPが50%未満になったとき、自動でメイト系アイテムを使用する

name: Absorption
Absorption
アブソプション
desc: Restores HP when an enemy dies within a fixed range while Guard Stance is active.

Passive
During Guard Stance, recover HP every time an enemy dies in your vicinity.
ガードスタンス中に一定範囲内でエネミーが死亡すると、HPが回復する

name: Guard Stance Up
Guard Stance Up 1
ガードスタンスアップ1
desc: Boosts your Melee Resistance while Guard Stance is in use.

Passive
Increases your striking resistance during Guard Stance.
ガードスタンス中の打撃耐性をアップ

name: Hunter Physique
Massive Hunter
マッシブハンター
desc: Reduces damage and prevents you from being launched into the air or knocked back.

Active
Reduce damage taken and prevent flinching and being blown away.
ダメージを減少させ、さらに打ち上げや吹き飛ばしも防ぐ

name: Flash Guard 1
Flash Guard 1
フラッシュガード1
desc: Decreases melee and ranged damage.

Passive
Reduces striking and shooting damage taken.
打撃・射撃ダメージを軽減する

name: Flash Tech Guard
Flash Tech Guard
フラッシュテックガード
desc: Decreases Technique damage.

Passive
Reduces technique damage taken.
法撃ダメージを軽減する

name: Flash Guard 2
Flash Guard 2
フラッシュガード2
desc: Decreases melee and ranged damage.

Passive
Reduces striking and shooting damage taken.
打撃・射撃ダメージを軽減する

name: Perfect Attack Bonus 1
JA Bonus 1
JAボーナス1
desc: Grants a damage bonus to non-Technique Perfect Attacks.

Passive
Increases the damage of Just Attacks, but not techniques.
テクニック以外のジャストアタックにダメージボーナスを得る

name: Perfect Attack Bonus 2
JA Bonus 2
JAボーナス2
desc: Grants a damage bonus to non-Technique Perfect Attacks.

Passive
Increases the damage of Just Attacks, but not techniques.
テクニック以外のジャストアタックにダメージボーナスを得る

name: Fury Stance
Fury Stance
フューリースタンス
desc: Passive Stance skill that boosts the melee and ranged attack damage you deal to enemies while also increasing the melee damage you take.

Active
Stance which increases striking and ranged damage dealt and striking damage received.
エネミーへの打撃・射撃ダメージを上昇させ、自分への打撃ダメージを上昇させるスタンススキル。リキャスト60秒

name: Critical Fury
Fury Critical
フューリークリティカル
desc: Boosts your critical hit rate while using Fury Stance.

Passive
Increases your critical hit rate during Fury Stance.
フューリースタンス中のクリティカルヒット率をアップ

name: Perfect Fury Bonus
Fury Combo Up
フューリーコンボアップ
desc: Grants a damage bonus every time you perform a successful Perfect Attack while Fury Stance is active. The maximum damage bonus is 10%.

Passive
While in Fury Stance, receive a damage bonus by continually performing Just Attacks successfully.
フューリースタンス状態のとき、連続でジャストアタックに成功するとダメージボーナスを得る

name: Fury Stance Up 1
Fury S Up 1
フューリーSアップ1
desc: Boosts the melee and ranged attack damage that you deal to enemies while using Fury Stance.

Passive
Increases your striking and shooting damage during Fury Stance.
フューリースタンス中にエネミーへの打撃・射撃ダメージを上昇する

name: Fury Stance Up 2
Fury S Up 2
フューリーSアップ2
desc: Boosts the melee and ranged attack damage that you deal to enemies while using Fury Stance.

Passive
Increases your striking and shooting damage during Fury Stance.
フューリースタンス中にエネミーへの打撃・射撃ダメージを上昇する

name: All Guard
All Guard
オールガード
desc: Allows for Guard to be performed in all directions, with Hunter weapons only.
This skill can only be used with a Main Class.

Passive
Allows guarding from all directions with Hunter weapons only.
Main class only.
ハンター武器のみ全方向にガードが可能になる。このスキルはメインクラスのみ適用される

name: Advanced Guard Stance
Guard Stance Advance
ガードスタンスアドバンス
desc: Grants a damage bonus for a set time when you perform a successful Perfect Guard while Guard Stance is active.
This skill can only be used with a Main Class.

Passive
Gain a damage bonus for a fixed period of time after successfully performing Just Guard during Guard Stance.
Main class only.
ガードスタンス時にジャストガードを成功させると、一定時間ダメージボーナスを得る。このスキルはメインクラスのみ適用される

name: Perfect Guard PP Gain
Just Guard PP Gain
ジャストガードPPゲイン
desc: Recovers PP when you perform a successful Perfect Guard with a Hunter weapon.
This skill can only be used with a Main Class.

Passive
Recover PP after successfully performing a Just Guard with a Hunter weapon.
Main class only.
ハンター武器でジャストガードを成功させるとPPが回復する。このスキルはメインクラスのみ適用される

name: Charged Parry
Charge Parry
チャージパリング
desc: Allows you to perform a Perfect Guard when initiating charged Photon Arts with a Hunter weapon.

Passive
Enable Just Guard at the beginning of charged PAs with Hunter weapons.
ハンター武器のチャージPA開始時にジャストガードが可能になる

name: High Level Bonus Hu
High Level Bonus Hu
ハイレベルボーナスHu
desc:
Passive
Gain a bonus to damage inflicted.

Passive
Gain a bonus to damage inflicted.
プレイヤーが与えるダメージにボーナスを得る

name: War Attract
War Attract
ウォーアトラクト
desc:
Passive
Improve the effectiveness of War Cry and add Jellen effect to it.
Main class only.

Passive
Improve the effectiveness of War Cry and add Jellen effect to it.
Main class only.
ウォークライの効果が強化され、ジェルンの効果が追加される。このスキルはメインクラスのみ適用される。

name: First Arts Perfect Attack Addition
First Arts JA Addition
ファーストアーツJAアディション
desc:
Passive
Turns your first attack into a Perfect Attack. A cooldown is applied after activation. Doesn't affect Harmonizer attacks, pet attacks, or Techniques.

Passive
First attack becomes a Just Attack. Cooldown begins after activation. Takt, Pet Attacks and Techs do not apply.
最初に放つ攻撃が、ジャストアタックになる。発動後にリキャストが発生する。タクトやペットの攻撃とテクニックは無効

name: Double Jump
Next Jump
ネクストジャンプ
desc:
Passive
Enables two-stage jumping.

Passive
Enables two-stage jumping.
２段ジャンプが可能になる

name: Sidestep Jump
Step Jump
ステップジャンプ
desc:
Passive
Jumping during a Dodge Action transitions you into a dash.

Passive
Jumping during a recovery action switches to sprinting.
回避アクション中にジャンプを行うことでダッシユ状態へ移行する

name: Air Reversal
Air Reversal
エアリバーサル
desc:
Passive
Allows you to perform a break-fall while in the air.

Passive
Enables recovery midair.
空中で受け身がとれるようになる

name: Perf. Recovery & ATK Combo
J Reversal JA Combo
JリバーサルJAコンボ
desc:
Passive
Makes Perfect-Attack timing apply after a Perfect Recovery.

Passive
The Just Attack circle appears after Just Reversal.
ジャストリバーサル後にジャストアタックタイミングが発生

name: Sidestep & Perf. ATK Combo
Step JA Combo
ステップJAコンボ
desc:
Passive
Makes Perfect-Attack timing apply during a Sidestep.

Passive
The JA circle appears during Step.
ステップ時にJAタイミングが発生するようになる
